fields.name: AffectedResourceCorrelationIds
fields.description: The list of affected resource correlation Ids. This can be used to uniquely identify the count of items affected by a specific category and severity as well as count of item affected by an specific issue.

fields.name: AffectedResourceSubtype
fields.description: The sub type of any subcomponent within the ARM resource that this might be applicable. Value remains null if not applicable.

fields.name: AffectedResourceType
fields.description: The type of affected ARM resource.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The category of the health error.

fields.name: SummaryCode
fields.description: The code of the health error.

fields.name: SummaryMessage
fields.description: The summary message of the health error.
